summary:
Canada is a vast country in North America, second only to Russia in size. It's home to over 41 million people and has a long history, dating back to indigenous settlements. The country was formed in 1867 when several British colonies united. It gradually gained independence from the UK and became a parliamentary democracy.

Canada has a diverse landscape, from coast to coast, and a mix of cultures due to immigration. It is known for its high quality of life, strong economy, and commitment to international peace and aid. The country's relationship with the United States is an important aspect of its history and economy.
title: Canada
